participant_1.background:
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family.
i enjoy hiking.
my favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

participant_2.background:
I love how the rhythm of hip hop beats can get my whole body moving.
i enjoy playing retro video games on my 386.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.
in my freetime i enjoy cloud watching.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

content.text: Hi, I'm Anya! What's your name?
Hi Anya, I'm Erica! It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too, Erica! I'm a big fan of hip hop music. What kind of music do you like?
I love hip hop too! It's so upbeat and energetic.
Yeah, it really gets me moving! Do you like to dance?
I love to dance! It's so much fun to express yourself through movement.
Me too! I love to go dancing at clubs and parties.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I usually just dance in my living room.
That's still fun! I love to just dance around and let loose.
Me too! I think dancing is a great way to relieve stress.
I totally agree! It's such a great way to get your body moving and have some fun.
I'm glad we agree! I love to find new people who share my interests.
Me too! I'm always up for meeting new people and making new friends.
It's been really nice talking to you, Anya! I hope we can hang out sometime soon.
I'd love that! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I'm free Saturday! We could go dancing or something.
That sounds like a perfect plan! I'll text you my number and we can figure out the details.
Great! I'm looking forward to it
